Headline: Forest Park- Bound Blue Line Service Delayed at Western
ShortDescription: Forest Park- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at  Western due to a police investigation. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park- Bound Blue Line trains are standing at  Western due to a police investigation.

Shuttles buses have been requested from Jefferson Park to Western to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes or using buses to other rail lines. Consider using the #56 Milwaukee for alternate service.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
